text: The 1972 European Karate Championships, the 7th edition of the European Karate Championships, was held in Brussels, Belgium from May 2 to 4, 1972. ==Competition== {| |- | Kumite -65 kg | Roger Paschy | Graham Mitchell | Harold La Rose Victor Tatarevic |- | Kumite -75 kg | Guy Sauvin | Francis Didier | Geert Lemmens Günter Mohr |- | Kumite - 80 kg | Dominique Valera | Jan Kallenbach | Alain Sterouck Jeff Peeters |- | Open Kumite | Gilbert Gruss | Dominique Valera | |- |} === Team === {| |- | Kumite | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1972 1972 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Belgium European Karate Championships European championships in 1972 Category:Sports competitions in Brussels Category:1970s in Brussels Category:Karate competitions in Belgium Category:May 1972 sports events in Europe
title: 1972 European Karate Championships
